title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       Food  Restrooms and water fountains are the only services on the island. Please bring lunch and water bottles. Ferry concession sells snacks such as cracker, candy bars, water and sodas.  Services  Bike rentals are available at the Sea Camp dock. Concessionaire rents bikes on a first-come-first serve basis when ferry is at dock. Fee: $16.00 per person per day, $20.00 per person for overnight
